titleStmt.title: 1. Dr. Tonges relation of the general massacre intended and plotted by the Papists: 2. Brought into Parliament by his direction and assistance: 3. Near the time of their prorogation, about the 22th. of June, 1678. by Richard Greene of Dilwin, in the county of Hereford, who first informed the doctor it.
titleStmt.author: Tonge, Ezerel, 1621-1680.

titleStmt.title: 1. Dr. Tonges relation of the general massacre intended and plotted by the Papists: 2. Brought into Parliament by his direction and assistance: 3. Near the time of their prorogation, about the 22th. of June, 1678. by Richard Greene of Dilwin, in the county of Hereford, who first informed the doctor it.
titleStmt.author: Tonge, Ezerel, 1621-1680.
Tong, William, 1662-1727, attributed name.
Greene, Richard, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Tong by Wing.
Place of publication from Wing; dated at end: May the 12th. 1679.
Includes advertisement at foot of p. 8.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
